main.name: Ben Szuchmacher
main.occupation: FullStack Developer 💻 and ✍️ Founder at BuntyJones Design Studio | ⚛️ ReactJS | 👷🏻+💪 Project Manager and Team Builder| 🐛 Expert at QA | 🍷 Wine Enthusiast|
main.description: Some languages I dabble in are: ReactJS, NodeJS, Python, AngularJS, SQL and MongoDB
main.bio: My name is Benjamin Szuchmacher. I am a dynamic and detail-oriented Full Stack Developer with a knack for conceptualizing and delivering elegant, user-friendly solutions effectively and efficiently. Armed with an extensive understanding of end-to-end SDLC and cloud computing, proficient in Front End and Back End technologies. Specific fields of interest include data analytics, Javascript, React.Js, Python, Vue, UI and UX technologies!
main.contactmessage: If you have an awesome idea or project you need to get done, you need advice or just to chat and maybe meet for coffee...

resume.skillmessage: Do you want to know what I am proficient in??

education.description: ITC's Computer FULL STACK/Data Science Bootcamp is a unique training course designed to transform hand-picked young professionals into qualified full-stack software developers. The program is a full time, 3.5 month, hands-on accelerator, which encourages research and self-led learning, as well as teamwork, all while incorporating industry's best practices. After the 3.5 months, the students are then placed in a two month internship where they can gain valuable experience and flourish in the market
1) Python Programming Essentials, 2) Responsive Website Basics: Code with HTML, CSS and JavaScript, 3) Ruby on Rails (An Introduction)

😀 JavaScript: The Hard Parts v2, 😁 Complete Intro to React--v5, 😂 Deep JavaScript Foundations--v3, 🤣 JavaScript: From Fundamentals to Functions JS--v2, 🙋‍♂ CSS Grids and Flexbox for Responsive Web Design, 👍 JavaScript: The New Hard Parts, 🤘🏼 Intermediate React --v2

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: 🎥 EyeKnow automatically detects positive and negative caregiver-to-toddler behavior in kindergartens by processing video feeds from off-the-shelf CCTV cameras using AI and computer-vision algorithms. 🔎 Meaningful events are recorded and shared with kindergarten owners, law enforcement agencies, and government stakeholders, which results in a dramatic decrease in abuse incidents and a significant increase in caring quality.  ⚛️ Mainly used ReactJS, JavaScript, NodeJS, MongoDB, SQL, AWS, Docker and Python

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: 💼 Managed projects for the two startups we took on at the agency. (BuzzHunter is a SaSS company). 💬 Collaborated with team members and other testers overseas to develop, test, and support product features. 💻 Worked with Engineers and Data Scientists to develop interactive, user-friendly applications. 🐛 In charge of QA testing for the website, bug checking as needed and submitting code fixes for the front end and back end. Agile was how we approached the planning, development, testing and support. 💼 In charge of making the design of website http://www.erticulate.com more user friendly and intuitive. 📐 Worked with Adobe and Figma. ⚛️ Mainly used ReactJS , SalesForce, Webflow (uploaded for client), JavaScript, NodeJS, MongoDB, SQL and Python

work.title: Junior Web Developer Trainee
work.description: 💻  Front-end: JavaScript (including ES6), ReactJS and Vue. 👨🏽‍💻 Back-end: 🐍 Python 3, SQL, NoSQL, Flask, Node.JS, ☁️☁️ Cloud: GCP (Cloud SQL, Serverless, Storage), Heroku (Dyno). Also taught were: REST APIs

work.title: Managing Partner
work.description: Consulting with clients on implementation of ideas and programming in languages such as HTML, JavaScript, and ReactJS. Creating products that are user-friendly, effective and appealing (UI/UX design). See what we are doing at http://www.blicode.co/

work.title: Founder
work.description: 🧠 BuntyJones Design Studio has been offering complete web design solutions to clients since 2018. We are based in Israel. 🧠 Our main focus is to clearly understand the core business visions of our clients, in order to bring about the transcending effect on their websites. ✈️ Designed and marketed website: http://www.israelwithdaniel.com. 🛩 Designed and marketed website: http://www.olimadvisors.com. 🤌 Designed and marketed website: http://www.eoskosher.com. 🥩 Designed and marketed website: http://www.avenuegrill.com. 🍣 Designed and marketed website: http://www.metsuyanteaneck.com

testimonials.text: After working closely with Ben I can say that the dedication and attention to details in his designs makes him a great Front end developer and UI/UX designer. Any company that will take him will greatly gain from his talent
Your website you created is incredible - put together in less than 2 days ((MIND BLOWN))

Hey Ben... Just got home and saw the final product. Unbelievable I can't believe that you did it out so quickly and professionally! I really really appreciate it, I'm so happy I got your referral. You saved me so much time and money, I want you to do all my sites.
